name: Planted Galaxy
description:
Use the power of the sun and rain to sustain life in the solar system.

Work together with a friend to carefully balance the needs of the planets. One player controls the sun and provides planets with the light plants need to grow. But be careful, too much sunlight will dehydrate the planet and turn it into a barren wasteland. The other player controls the rain clouds and provides water to the planets to sustain the plants, but too much water will flood the planet.

=============================================

Controls

Player 1

A/D -- rotate the sun

F/G -- rotate the blue orbits

Player 2

Left/Right Arrow Key -- rotate the orbit of the rain cloud

Comma and Slash -- rotate the orange orbits
